message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $90 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $75 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. How about $82?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $82 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. How about we split the difference at $80?
